channel.title: sunday tea with skimmingtonride
channel.description: a million different shades of good dance music plus misplaced nostalgia, incongruities, and other random sounds.
channel.itunes:subtitle: acid time travel to futurepast
channel.itunes:author: skimmingtonride
channel.itunes:summary: a million different shades of good dance music plus misplaced nostalgia, incongruities, and other random sounds.

item.title: I put a spell on you
item.description: 1. Another Day (blood diamonds remix) - Apache Beat 2. Yearning - Black Van 3. Illuminations - Hungry Ghost 4. I Zimbra - Talking Heads 5. Get Up (Just John mix) - John Waynes 6. Wholehearted Mess (Pink Skull remix) - Bear in Heaven 7. Fire Eyes - Canyons 8. Sunbeams - Trickski 9. Suppress Your Feelings (Ray Mang Remix) - Mock & Toof 10. The Most Certain Sure (Live Spencer Remix) - !!! 11. Wendy not Walter (Original Version) - Prins Thomas 12. After Rain Comes Sun - Solomun 13. Temporary Home - Allies 14. A Nomad's Retreat - Pantha du Prince

item.title: mostly songs with the word house in the title

Jackin' National Anthem - Ramos 5. Bad Boys - Screamin' Rachael 6. House Girl (feat. Mystic) [Serge & Tyrell Edit] - Rodney Bakerr 7. House (feat. Steve Bug) - Phonique 8. item.title: SLICE ME NICE! Guest Italo mix by dj Tater
item.description: ///////////////////////////////////////////// SLICE ME NICE monthly party on sundays starting jan 25 2009 ITALO - HI NRG - FREESTYLE @ arrow bar (85 ave A) hosted by damacio & dj Tater guest dj this month Phyllis Killer there will be dirty dancers. starts at 10pm . no cover. facebook group: SLICE ME NICE NYC Tracklist: 1. the realm accapella 2. mr flagio - take a chance 3. sylvester - rock the box 4. flo astair - monkey 5. mbo & klein - dirty talk 6. ken lazlo - hey hey guy 7. k.o.t.o. - visitor 8. hazel dean - searchin' 9. divine - shake it up
item.dc:creator: skimmingtonride
item.itunes:summary:
///////////////////////////////////////////// SLICE ME NICE monthly party on sundays starting jan 25 2009
ITALO - HI NRG - FREESTYLE
@ arrow bar (85 ave A)
hosted by damacio & dj Tater
guest dj this month Phyllis Killer
there will be dirty dancers.
starts at 10pm . no cover.
facebook group: SLICE ME NICE NYC
Tracklist:
1. the realm accapella 2. mr flagio - take a chance 3. sylvester - rock the box 4. flo astair - monkey 5. mbo & klein - dirty talk 6. ken lazlo - hey hey guy 7. k.o.t.o. - visitor 8. hazel dean - searchin' 9. divine - shake it up

item.title: clear hudson music for nico muhly
item.description: 1. madrugada eterna - klf / mouthful of silence - david toop & max eastley 2. rale - autechre 3. paperbitch - trickski 4. your place or mine? - audion 5. a night like this (richie hawtin's a dub like that remix) - steve bug 6. maybe, she said - booka shade 7. die alte leier - t. raumschmiere 8. music for 18 musicians: section IX - grand valley state university new music ensemble (steve reich) 9. a rainbow in curved air - terry riley 10. asleep at the wheel - working for a nuclear free city 11. safari - holy fuck 12. sportster - fennesz 13. uk - burial 14. tomorrow - scsi 9/superpitcher 15. pensum - markus guentner/m. mayer 16. radio 4 - pil / madrugada eterna (reprise haha) - klf 17. secret girls (live 1986 continental club) - sonic youth things will never be the same - black dice

item.title: I'm Glad We're Friends!
item.description: Welcome! Off to a sick start. 1. Intro - William Burroughs 2. Misty Circles - Dead or Alive 3. Everything's Gone Green - New Order 4. Life After Sundown - Glass Candy 5. Zdarlight - Digitalism 6. You Got Me Feeling (Cicada Remix) - Cicada 7. Pump Up the Jam - Technotronic 8. Suckerpin - Modeselektor 9. Crossover Appeal - Guns n' Bombs 10. Enjoy the Silence (Ewan Pearson Remix) - Depeche Mode 11. Disappointed- Electronic 12. Hold On (Blackjoy Mazego Groove) - Holy Ghost! 13. Park It In the Shade - Sasha 14. We Are - Lopazz 15. Like Something 4 Porno! (Kris Menace Remix) - Felix da Housecat 16. Lost Dub - Trickski 17. Untrue - Burial
